On 12/13/05, godhs_g <godhs_g@...> wrote:
> Hi,
>
> I need to automat=
e unit testing using JUNIT for my application.
> I am new to junit. I learn=
t that many of you are using junit in your
> projects. Could someone throw =
light on how to start with
> the automation part (testing framework or test=
case generation tools
> etc...).

Absolutely the first thing to do is make =
sure that your unit tests are
excellent. Without good tests, you're just au=
tomating unhelpful tests.
There are now a number of good JUnit books availa=
ble.

The second thing to do is to select a build tool like Ant or Maven an=
d
learn to use it to drive your tests. I recommend Ant, personaly, but
ther=
e are plenty of folks who like Maven.

> Thanks in advance,
> godhs

You're=
 welcome.
